ChineseHoroscopePage.title: Chinese Horoscope
ChineseHoroscopePage.subtitle: Explore the wisdom of the Chinese zodiac. Discover your animal sign and its traits.
ChineseHoroscopePage.comingSoon: Detailed horoscopes and more coming soon for Chinese Astrology!
ChineseHoroscopePage.calculationNote: Note: This calculation is based on the Gregorian year. The Chinese New Year varies, so if you were born in January or February, your sign might differ.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Gentle, quiet, elegant, and alert; quick and skillful.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confident, intelligent, enthusiastic, and a natural leader.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Lively, active, energetic, and loves to be in a crowd.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Mild-mannered, shy, stable, sympathetic, and amicable.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observant, hardworking, resourceful, courageous, and talented.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honest, amiable, kind, cautious, and prudent.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rat.interpretatio: Rats are known for their charm and intelligence. They are natural opportunists with an incredible ability to adapt to new situations. Their curiosity is boundless, and they are always looking for ways to improve their lives and the lives of those around them. While they can be a bit thrifty, they are extremely loyal to their friends and family. Their quick mind and sociable nature make them excellent strategists and problem-solvers.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Ox.interpretation: The Ox symbolizes strength, diligence, and reliability. They are tireless workers who believe in the power of patience and perseverance. Their methodical approach to life allows them to build solid and lasting foundations. Although they can be stubborn and resistant to change, their loyalty and sense of duty are unwavering. An Ox is a friend and partner you can always count on.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Tiger.interpretat: The Tiger is the epitome of courage, charisma, and confidence. They are natural leaders with a magnetic energy that draws others in. They live life with passion and intensity, and they are not afraid to take risks to achieve their goals. Their unpredictable nature makes them exciting, but they can also be impulsive and hot-tempered. A Tiger will always stand up for what they believe is right and will fiercely protect their loved ones.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rabbit.interpreta: The Rabbit is a symbol of peace, elegance, and sensitivity. They are gentle souls who crave a harmonious environment and avoid conflict at all costs. Their diplomatic nature and good taste make them excellent hosts and friends. Although they may seem timid, they are extremely vigilant and astute, capable of navigating danger with grace. Their greatest strength is their ability to create beauty and tranquility around them.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dragon.interpreta: The Dragon is the most powerful and auspicious sign of the Chinese zodiac. They are charismatic visionaries, full of energy, ambition, and an innate desire to lead. Their self-confidence is immense, and they are not afraid of challenges. They can sometimes seem arrogant, but their heart is generous, and they are always willing to help others. A Dragon is destined to leave a mark on the world.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Snake.interpretat: The Snake is wise, enigmatic, and deeply intuitive. They possess a sharp mind and a calmness that hides great inner strength. They are excellent strategists who prefer to work quietly, analyzing situations from all angles before making a move. While they can be secretive and distrustful, they are extremely loyal and possessive of the people they love. Their wisdom and magnetic charm are their greatest gifts.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Horse.interpretat: The Horse is a free spirit, full of energy, optimism, and an insatiable love for adventure. They are extremely sociable and love to be at the center of the action. Their independence is their most prized possession, and they hate feeling tied down or restricted. Although their impulsive nature can lead them to make hasty decisions, their enthusiasm is contagious, and their ability to bounce back from setbacks is admirable.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Goat.interpretati: The Goat is the artist of the Chinese zodiac, a kind, creative, and compassionate soul. They are dreamers who value beauty, peace, and harmony above all else. Their sensitive nature makes them very empathetic, but also prone to melancholy and indecisiveness. They need a stable and supportive environment for their creativity to flourish. A Goat is a loyal friend and a sympathetic partner.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Monkey.interpreta: The Monkey is the mischievous genius of the zodiac. They are incredibly intelligent, witty, and curious, with an unparalleled ability to solve complex problems in creative ways. Their sense of humor and love of fun make them the life of any social gathering. The challenge for the Monkey is to channel their mental energy so they don't get bored or become too manipulative. Their greatest asset is their ability to innovate and adapt to any situation.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rooster.interpret: The Rooster is the perfectionist of the zodiac, observant, hardworking, and with a great sense of duty. They are extremely organized and have a keen eye for detail, making them excellent planners. Their honesty is direct and sometimes brutal, as they believe in telling the truth to improve things. Although they can seem arrogant, they are deeply loyal and always willing to work hard for the good of their family and community.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dog.interpretatio: The Dog is the loyal and honest guardian of the zodiac. Their sense of justice and their loyalty are absolute. They are friends and partners who can be trusted blindly, always ready to defend the weak and fight for what is right. Their nature can sometimes be pessimistic or anxious, as they tend to worry about others. A Dog is the most faithful companion one could wish for.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Pig.interpretatio: The Pig is a symbol of generosity, honesty, and good fortune. They are kind-hearted souls who enjoy the simple pleasures of life and work hard to provide for their loved ones. Their trusting nature and lack of pretense endear them to everyone. Although they can sometimes be a bit naive, their heart is pure, and their optimism is unwavering. A Pig in your life is a constant source of joy and unconditional support.
MayanHoroscopePage.title: Mayan Horoscope
MayanHoroscopePage.subtitle: Discover the ancient insights of Mayan astrology.
MayanHoroscopePage.comingSoon: More Mayan tools and calculations coming soon!
MayanHoroscopePage.question: Essential Question:
MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: The Mayan Kin is a unit of time and energy in the Tzolkin (sacred Mayan calendar). It represents your personal galactic signature, combining the energy of a Solar Seal and a Galactic Tone, offering insights into your purpose and life path.
MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Select your birth date to discover your Mayan Kin.
MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Error calculating your Kin. Please check the date and try again.
MayanHoroscopePage.showCalculationExplan: See how your Kin is calculated
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Base Date: July 26, 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetic Dragon) is used as the starting point in the Dreamspell count.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Days Elapsed: We calculate the total number of days between the base date and your birth date.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin Number: Using modulo 260 (total kins in the Tzolkin), we get your Kin number (1-260). Simplified formula: Kin = ((DaysSinceBase + BaseKin - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Solar Seal (Nahual): Derived from the Kin number using modulo 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galactic Tone: Derived from the Kin number using modulo 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: This is a modern interpretation (Dreamspell) of the Mayan Tzolkin. Other traditional counts exist.

GalacticTone.Magnetic.name: Magnetic
GalacticTone.Magnetic.question: What is my purpose?
GalacticTone.Lunar.name: Lunar
GalacticTone.Lunar.question: What are my challenges?
GalacticTone.Electric.name: Electric
GalacticTone.Electric.question: How can I best serve?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.name: Self-Existing
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.question: What is the form of action?
GalacticTone.Overtone.name: Overtone
GalacticTone.Overtone.question: How can I empower myself?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.name: Rhythmic
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.question: How do I organize for equality?
GalacticTone.Resonant.name: Resonant
GalacticTone.Resonant.question: How can I attune my service to others?
GalacticTone.Galactic.name: Galactic
GalacticTone.Galactic.question: Do I live what I believe?
GalacticTone.Solar.name: Solar
GalacticTone.Solar.question: How do I achieve my purpose?
GalacticTone.Planetary.name: Planetary
GalacticTone.Planetary.question: How do I perfect what I do?
GalacticTone.Spectral.name: Spectral
GalacticTone.Spectral.question: How do I release and let go?
GalacticTone.Crystal.name: Crystal
GalacticTone.Crystal.question: How can I dedicate to cooperation?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.name: Cosmic
GalacticTone.Cosmic.question: How do I expand my joy and love?
GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: The Magnetic Tone is the starting point, the great magnet that attracts everything necessary to fulfill a purpose. It represents primordial unity and the unification of all parts of your being to focus on a clear objective. It is the energy that asks: What is my true intention? What do I wish to attract into my life? Today, this tone invites you to identify and unify your will, to define your purpose for the next 13 days. It's not about acting, but about attracting and setting the course.
GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: The Lunar Tone introduces duality, polarity, and challenge. It presents you with the obstacles and opposing forces you need to stabilize in order to move forward. It is the mirror that shows you what is preventing your progress. This tone is not negative; the polarities it reveals are what create movement and stability. Today, reflect: What are the two sides of my current situation? What challenges are strengthening me and teaching me to find balance?
GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: The Electric Tone is the spark of life, the energy that activates and sets things in motion. It's the moment to join the pieces and create connections. It represents service, asking you how your gifts and talents can benefit a greater purpose. It is the time for action, for building bridges, and for activating your resources. Today, consider: How can I best serve my purpose? What actions can I take to unite and activate my environment?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: The Self-Existing Tone defines, measures, and gives shape to action. It is the architect that creates the structure and foundations upon which your purpose will be built. It helps you understand how to manifest your ideas in a concrete and orderly way. It is the time to establish patterns, define boundaries, and give a tangible form to your intention. Today, think: What is the most effective form for my action? What structures do I need to create to sustain my vision?
GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: The Overtone Tone commands, gathers power, and confers authority. It is the moment to gather all your internal and external resources, to take center stage, and to radiate your intrinsic power. This tone empowers you to lead from your center and manage your talents with confidence. Today, focus on: How can I gather and organize my resources? In what way am I projecting my personal power and radiance to the world?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: The Rhythmic Tone seeks dynamic balance and organization. It is the energy that helps you find your rhythm in the flow of life, to walk with a steady pace, and to manage challenges organically and with balance. It represents equality and the ability to adapt without losing your center. Today, seek balance in all your actions. Ask yourself: How can I organize my life to create more harmony? Am I walking at a pace that nurtures me?
GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: The Resonant Tone is the mystical channel that connects you to the source of inspiration and universal wisdom. It is the energy of attunement, allowing you to vibrate in harmony with everything around you. This tone invites you to listen attentively, to receive messages, and to align your service with a higher purpose. Today, attune to your inner self. Meditate: What truly inspires me? How can I be a channel for the energy flowing through me?
GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: The Galactic Tone models integrity and harmony, asking if you live in accordance with what you believe. It is an examination of coherence between your thoughts, words, and actions. It invites you to embody your truth and be a model of your deepest beliefs. Today, live your truth with integrity. Reflect: Do my actions reflect my deepest values? Am I an example of what I preach?
GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: The Solar Tone pulses with intention and the energy of realization. It is the moment to give the final push for your plans to manifest. This tone gives you the strength to move towards your goal with determination and a clear purpose. It is focused action that comes from a well-defined intention. Today, direct your energy towards achieving your goals. Ask yourself: What decisive action can I take today to make my purpose a reality?
GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: The Planetary Tone perfects and produces. It is the moment when your intentions manifest on the physical plane, when your vision becomes tangible. It represents the culmination of a cycle of action, where you can see and touch the results of your work. Today, focus on perfecting what you have created. Observe: What is manifesting in my life as a result of my intentions? How can I improve and refine this manifestation?
GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: The Spectral Tone dissolves, releases, and lets go. It is the energy that helps you disintegrate old structures, free yourself from what no longer serves you, and open space for the new. It represents catharsis and the release of emotional and mental burdens. Today, allow the old to go. Consider: What do I need to release in my life? From what beliefs, habits, or relationships must I free myself to move forward?
GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: The Crystal Tone is dedicated to cooperation, complexity, and the universalization of purpose. It is the energy that teaches you to share your gifts and work together for a greater good. It represents the round table where everyone collaborates as equals. Today, look for ways to cooperate and share. Reflect: How can I dedicate myself to the service of the community? In what way can my actions benefit everyone?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: The Cosmic Tone is the final step, the one that transcends and endures. It represents presence in the here and now, and the expansion of consciousness to embrace a new cycle. It is the time to celebrate the journey and prepare for the next beginning. Today, live fully in the present. Experience: How can I expand my joy and love without limits and prepare for the next purpose the universe has for me?

DreamWizard.step1.title: Describe your Dream
DreamWizard.step1.description: Narrate the main story of your dream in as much detail as possible.
DreamWizard.step1.placeholder: I was in a dark forest and suddenly started flying over a city made of clouds...
DreamWizard.step2.title: People or Beings
DreamWizard.step2.description: Who appeared in your dream? (e.g., family, strangers, talking animals)
DreamWizard.step2.placeholder: My mother, an old friend, a fox that was guiding me...
DreamWizard.step3.title: Places and Scenery
DreamWizard.step3.description: Where did the dream take place? (e.g., childhood home, an unknown place, outer space)
DreamWizard.step3.placeholder: On a black sand beach, inside a crystal castle...
DreamWizard.step4.title: Dominant Emotions
DreamWizard.step4.description: What emotions did you feel most strongly during the dream?
DreamWizard.step4.placeholder: Joy, fear, confusion, a sense of peace...
DreamWizard.step5.title: Symbols and Objects
DreamWizard.step5.description: Were there any objects, colors, or symbols that repeated or stood out?
DreamWizard.step5.placeholder: A golden key, a stopped clock, water everywhere...
DreamWizard.step6.title: Dream Intensity
DreamWizard.step6.description: How vivid or intense was your dream?
DreamWizard.loadingMessage: The spirits are analyzing the symbols and emotions of your journey...
DreamWizard.error.coreRequired: The main dream description is required.
